## Watcher.enableBatchMode() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> will removed in 0.7.0
> 

Dismiss the warning that let you enable single mode but the warning is false positive.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enableBatchMode(): this;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
